column4: hey everybody.  Im trying to install xubuntu on my laptop inplace of ubuntu.  when i get to the paritioning section of the install it says "no root file system defined"  and it doesnt give me any options about which partition to install on?
have you clicked ona partition to define what file format..thats where you define what goes on there too?
